interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown
Review Date: 2016/07/04
Store: Godefroy
Product Description: ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'}
Review Text: Really worth the buy, my eyebrows are black and this color is perfect. This product really helps out if you are trying to grow out your natural eyebrows.
Review Title: Great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Japan 100gram 3Cup Size Must Up Breast & Butt Enlargment Cream Pueraria Mirifica (3 Tubes 100g)
Must Up
['Correct Massage Techniques: Step 1: Spread the cream to the breast all around. Step 2: The body slightly to bend down, both hands pat the breast base, and upwardly pushes 10 times of each. Step 3: Pushes from the armpit to the cleavage 10 times of each. Step 4: With the middle finger and the ring finger, pulls several times of the chest ligament, is helpful to strength the breast and enhancement. Tips : 1) During the first week of using, massage twice a day in the morning and at night. 2) It is more effective to use the cream after taking a bath. 3) When your bust becomes fuller, remember to wear bras that fit and massage your bust every day.']
{'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '100 Grams', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.2 x 1.7 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'December 30, 2013', 'Manufacturer': 'Must Up'}
I like it I used the whole cream, I did not really see a different in size of my boobs or my butt, but it did make for a good moisturizer, which always helps with stretch marks.
meh not bad, not good

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category**: The user remains passionate about hair extensions and is increasingly focused on effective hair coloring solutions. Their interest continues to include diverse color and texture options, especially for precise applications.

- **Preferences**: The user prioritizes high-quality, thicker extensions made from natural materials and highly values products that facilitate targeted coloring. They seek effective moisturization in skincare, emphasizing practical benefits over cosmetic enhancements.

- **Hair Type**: Engages with a variety of products suited for different hair types, including wavy, curly, oily, dry, and normal, along with tools for detailed coloring applications.

- **Review Behavior**: The user provides insightful feedback, highlighting product effectiveness and addressing issues like tangling. Their ratings consistently reflect a preference for dependable results in extensions and color applications.

- **Trends**: Actively explores innovative coloring products that enable versatility and precision in personal grooming, showcasing a commitment to improving their beauty routine with practical solutions.

- **Quality Criteria**: Values high-quality hair extensions and effective hair coloring solutions that address common challenges and focus on tangible outcomes.

- **Overall Attitude**: Shows enthusiasm for new purchases, maintaining a willingness to try various beauty and personal care products that meet practical needs, as evidenced by their positive reviews of reliable coloring solutions.
